sentence.Network_en: He presents his horrifying experience with a noble dispassion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以令人佩服的平静语气,叙述自己骇人听闻的经验.

sentence.Network_en: Her manner assumed a dispassion and dryness very unlike her usual tone.
sentence.Network_cn: 她装出一种冷静和超然的样子,非常不像她平常的神气.

sentence.Network_en: It approaches its subject with the dispassion of a science.
sentence.Network_cn: 但它以科学的冷静来研究这个主题.
